question: The male sex accessory ducts include,
choices: Rete testis, vasa efferentia, seminal vesicle and vas deferens
Rete testis, vasa efferentia, epididymis and seminal vesicle
Rete testis, vasa efferentia, epididymis and vas deferens
Rete testis, urethra, epididymis and vas deferens
explanation: Male sex accessory ducts include rete testis, vasa efferentia, epididymis, and vas deferens. Seminal vesicles are accessory *glands*.
